cards.text: On September 21st Small World News will host a StoryMaker Masters Class for editorial staff at Radio Zamaneh.
For each of the next 5 weeks before that class, Small World News will provide a brief assignment to complete.
Each week we will also set a time for you to speak with Small World News' trainer and your StoryMaker coach.
For your first assignment, we'd like you to create a brief audio story about what you are working on this week.

goals: To start, press record, and hold your phone's microphone up to record the sounds of your workplace.
Now hold the phone's microphone to your mouth and describe the story you are working on today.
Answer one more question: What do you like about working at Radio Zamaneh?

cards.text: Great! Remember to hold your phone so that your hand is not touching the microphone.
Now using the Order button on the next card, rearrange your clips if you wish. Trim any clip by tapping the clip image.
Once you are ready, click Publish. On the PublishActivity screen, press the play button on the left to hear your story. Then email it to your StoryMaker coach.
